name: intervalMillis()
description: Returns true for the first interval and then false for the second interval. The starting interval can bechanged by passing a true as a third parameter.

parameters.name: millis1
parameters.description: Time in milliseconds for the first interval

parameters.name: millis2
parameters.description: Time in milliseconds for the seconds interval

parameters.name: skipFirst
parameters.description: If true start with the second interval
